Council_Bluffs.Iowa School for the Deaf:
Iowa School for the Deaf is a pre-K to 12th grade school for deaf and hard-of-hearing students located in Council Bluffs, Iowa. It serves students who live in Iowa or Nebraska.


== History ==
The founders of Iowa School for the Deaf were Edmund Booth (1810–1905) and William E. Ijams (1830–1893).
